description:
Salutations, it`s Meiko. Can you imagine? Mayu`s having a marriage meeting with the Lord Tsukuyomi! And all that without asking me first! Sasana, are you alright with that!? Anyway, we have to align our forces and do everything to get Mayu back! Let`s go!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 奇縁宿縁コンテンション
